argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nffo.1 | |- F/_ x F |
| 2 |  | nffo.2 | |- F/_ x A |
| 3 |  | nffo.3 | |- F/_ x B |
| 4 |  | #P_df-fo | |- ( F : A -onto-> B <-> ( F Fn A /\ ran F = B ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_nffn | |- F/ x F Fn A |
| 6 | 1 | #P_nfrn | |- F/_ x ran F |
| 7 | 6, 3 | #P_nfeq | |- F/ x ran F = B |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_nfan | |- F/ x ( F Fn A /\ ran F = B ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_nfxfr | |- F/ x F : A -onto-> B |
